info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Alexander County through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Taylorsville, or 5 miles west of Love Valley, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Stony Point, Vashti and Hiddenite. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
